code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Tasks(){const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[taskInput,setTaskInput]=useState('');const addTask=()=>{if(taskInput.trim()&&tasks.length<3){setTasks([...tasks,taskInput.trim()]);setTaskInput('');}};const deleteTask=index=>{setTasks(tasks.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"tasks p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl mb-4",children:"Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"border p-2 rounded w-full mb-2",placeholder:"Add a new task",value:taskInput,onChange:e=>setTaskInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded",onClick:addTask,children:"Add Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-disc pl-6",children:tasks.map((task,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"mb-2 flex justify-between items-center",children:[task,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-500 text-white px-2 py-1 rounded",onClick:()=>deleteTask(index),children:"Delete"})]},index))})]});}export default Tasks;
